ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: You play NWN too?? That is such a fun game although I don t like how reliant the movement is on the mouse. I don t like to use my mouse that much. And my
ygData.messageBody:
You play NWN too??
That is such a fun game although I don't like how reliant the movement is on
the mouse. I don't like to use my mouse that much. And my hirelings are hard
to control. Like when they decide to run out of my view and attack things
that I was planning to avoid so as not to get wiped out.
I have a lvl 11 cleric.
luv,
-Su

> You could always do what my boyfriend does... He works most of the year
(he's a software engineer {contractor}) then he takes a few months off
during the summer =D It's awsome. We've had a great time Leveling our
characters & playing neverwinter nights
> Kat
